Text:
You're just awesome!!
Really hope you get your skull soon!
Gog upp, i like the encouragement you give at the end of the description for users to buy the games abd support the devs. Good job.
Thank you mate, appreciate it... Ill pay it on GoG whenever i got spare money... Long live gog.com
Awesome work. Try to pay GoG when I can but could anyone upload the old Journeyman Project games or Phantasmagoria 1 and 2? Old memories :)
GOG, would ye please upload Silent Steel (it's an old early 90's Submarine Game- cinematics & choice type)..  seems nobody has it & have been lookin for it.  Thank Ye & keep up the great work!

Got it to work great on Win 7 x64 on my high-end setup. Solution was to go to properties, compatibilities tab, then set both nwmain and nwn.exe to:
- Run in Windows XP (Service Pack 3)
- Run this program as an administrator.

Then in security tab, set:
- Full Control to allow in edit menu.
